graph_title: Nombre de personnes décédées, disparues ou directement touchées lors de catastrophes, pour 100 000 personnes

SDG_GOAL: Goal 1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG_TARGET: 1.5 By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
